timeline.bodyText: As this is public, it might be in use somewhere and probably shouldn't be removed?
timeline.author: danielnaber

replies.bodyText:
Theoretically it can, although I don't think it's likely. This method was introduced relatively recently, and exposes internal stuff that needs synchronization, that's why I've removed it. I also see other possibilities, if you think it's so important:

Leave it but deprecate
Leave it but return a thread-safe new speller, like in getSuggestions below.
WDYT?
replies.author: donnerpeter
